data.name: SpaceCraft Brawl
data.detailed_description:
SpaceCraft Brawl is a top-down, multiplayer, physics driven, space shooter game with destructible spacecraft parts.

Key Features

  • Multiplayer
    - Create or join lobbies with a bunch of different gameplay settings. Hosts can decide everything from who can join the game, to how fast the game will play, to how powerful each individual weapon is.
  • Ship building
    - Build your own spacecrafts from scratch using thrusters, weapons, shield generators, an engine, and other blocks of various shapes and durability.
    - If you are feeling too lazy to build your own spacecrafts, or your opponents have stronger spacecrafts than you, you can copy and use all spacecrafts from all the other players in your current game to even things out.
  • Destructible spacecrafts
    - All parts in a spacecraft is destructible, so it's important to protecting ship parts like thrusters, weapons, and the engine.
  • Weapons
    - The game features a variety of different weapons, all with different strengths and weaknesses. You can change weapons at any time during the game, if you feel like changing your playstyle or adapting to a new situation.
  • Powerups
    - Fight to control small areas on the map to receive super weapons. These weapons are extremely powerful, and can have a huge impact in fights, if used well.
  • Physics driven gameplay
    - All movement is physics based, meaning your spacecrafts center of mass and thruster placements will affect how easy it is to pilot your ship. Some projectiles and world objects are also controlled by physics.
  • Map Editor
    - Get creative and create custom maps in an easy to use map editor!

The game is easy to get into, but hard to master.

data.short_description: A top-down, multiplayer, physics driven, space shooter game with destructible ship parts. Build your own spacecrafts. Fight with and against other players in different game modes, using a variety of weapons. Pick up super weapons and slice enemy ships in half. Easy to get into, hard to master.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Optional
